titles.title: Recognizing the 150th anniversary of Kansas State University.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 2/14/2013--Introduced. Congratulates Kansas State University for 150 years of outstanding service to Kansas, this country, and the world in fulfilling its mission as a land-grant university. Thanks Kansas for its visionary leadership in the beginning of the land-grant movement in this country.
